original_text: “And if a man has committed a crime punishable by death and he is put to death, and you hang him on a tree,
korean_text: 사람이 만일 죽을 죄를 범하므로 네가 그를 죽여 나무 위에 달거든

sentences.original_text: And if a man has committed a crime punishable by death
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 만약 어떤 사람이 사형에 해당하는 죄를 지었고

sentences.original_text: and he is put to death,
and you hang him on a tree,
